evidence.text: NOTICE OF APPEAL as to 52 Order on Motion for Partial Summary Judgment
United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit

extracted.value: Appeal: All Plaintiffs appealed to United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit.

evidence.text: IT IS THEREFORE ORDERED that the plaintiffs’ motion for a preliminary injunction (ECF No. 28) is denied.

extracted.value: Court denied plaintiffs’ motion for a preliminary injunction.

evidence.text: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the plaintiffs’ motion for class certification (ECF No. 34) is denied.

extracted.value: Court denied plaintiffs’ motion for class certification.

evidence.text: On May 23, 2024, the court granted the defendants’ motion for partial summary judgment.

extracted.value: Court granted defendants’ motion for partial summary judgment.

evidence.text: The court dismissed Patrick Kurkowski, Kenneth Dalberg, Edgar Salinas-Leal, Bradley Schmitt, Justin Welch, Ashton Dreiling, John Anderson, and Jayvon Flemming as plaintiffs, and dismissed the plaintiffs’ mental health and isolation-related claims.

extracted.value: Court dismissed Patrick Kurkowski, Kenneth Dalberg, Edgar Salinas-Leal, Bradley Schmitt, Justin Welch, Ashton Dreiling, John Anderson, and Jayvon Flemming as plaintiffs.

evidence.text: They filed this proposed class action on October 26, 2023

evidence.text: The plaintiffs filed an amended complaint on November 21, 2023 (ECF No. 14)

evidence.text: Following a scheduling conference (ECF No. 25), the court on January 24, 2024, issued a scheduling order (ECF No. 26)

evidence.text: On March 22, 2024, the plaintiffs moved for a preliminary injunction. (ECF No. 28.)

evidence.text: This appeal is DISMISSED in accordance with Federal Rule of Appellate Procedure 42(b).
